entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 11:18 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
